Dear Shagan,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

*	Cargo was delivered on August 20, 2025 in clean condition. Please send immediate notice of loss sent by Habchi against Enkay and Qatar Airways

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar

ID: CCP5JFJ_02
From: Vic Eldrin Munar <Vic.Munar@gig-gulf.com>
To: Shagan Abdelmegid <Shagan.Abdelmegid@chalhoub.com>
CC: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; row shipping <row.shipping@chalhoub.com>; Marine Cargo Claims <marinecargo.claims@gig-gulf.com>
BCC:

Subject: RE: AE_AI181604 CO70 - Pre-Alert / Chalhoub (RE500) - MKKW250806 by Air Shipment || 23/MO/18357

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


PUBLIC



Dear Shagan,

 

Thanks for the email.

 

Please note of our below remarks:

 

*	The proof of delivery does not contain any remarks regarding damages; therefore, the cargo was received in good condition on August 20, 2025.
*	Your team from Habchi only reported the damages on August 30. Kindly clarify the reason for the delayed reporting. Please note that marine insurance only covers losses that occur during transit.
*	Your notice to the forwarders and carriers was only sent on September 3. Kindly clarify the reason for the delay.

	 

	Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

	 

	Best Regards,

	 

	Vic Eldrin Munar

	Non Motor Claims Manager (Property & Casualty)

	Tel: (+971) 4 440 3759
